TopicTitle: Unity doesn't list partTools when creating a new project

Articles.Content:
I just installed Unity 4.2.2 and extracted part tools .23 to the standard packages folder. However, when I try to create a new project, partTools isn't listed in the list of packages to import.

Ideas?

==EDIT==

Disregard but I'm leaving this up in case someone else has this issue. You can drag and drop assets into unity. For future use I then right clicked the partTools folder and exported it as a .unityPackage.

Edited May 10, 2015 by Styles2304
